sn12.65:1.2: “Pubbe me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn12.65:1.3: ‘kicchā vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca.
sn12.65:1.4: Atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassa.
sn12.65:1.5: Kudāssu nāma imassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyissati jarāmaraṇassā’ti?
sn12.65:1.7: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti?
sn12.65:1.8: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.65:1.9: ‘jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti.
sn12.65:2.11: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.65:2.12: ‘viññāṇe kho sati nāmarūpaṃ hoti, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpan’ti.
sn12.65:2.14: ‘kimhi nu kho sati viññāṇaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā viññāṇan’ti?
sn12.65:2.15: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.65:2.16: ‘nāmarūpe kho sati viññāṇaṃ hoti, nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇan’ti.
sn12.65:3.2: paccudāvattati kho idaṃ viññāṇaṃ nāmarūpamhā na paraṃ gacchati.
sn12.65:3.3: Ettāvatā jāyetha vā jīyetha vā mīyetha vā cavetha vā upapajjetha vā, yadidaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇaṃ;
sn12.65:3.8: ‘Samudayo, samudayo’ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
sn12.65:4.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati, jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti;
sn12.65:4.4: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.65:4.8: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jāti na hoti …pe…
sn12.65:4.17: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.65:5.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati viññāṇaṃ na hoti;
sn12.65:5.4: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.65:6.2: adhigato kho myāyaṃ maggo bodhāya yadidaṃ—
sn12.65:6.8: ‘Nirodho, nirodho’ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
sn12.65:7.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso araññe pavane caramāno passeyya purāṇaṃ maggaṃ purāṇañjasaṃ pubbakehi manussehi anuyātaṃ.
sn12.65:7.3: Tamanugacchanto passeyya purāṇaṃ nagaraṃ purāṇaṃ rājadhāniṃ pubbakehi manussehi ajjhāvuṭṭhaṃ ārāmasampannaṃ vanasampannaṃ pokkharaṇīsampannaṃ uddhāpavantaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
sn12.65:7.4: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā āroceyya:
sn12.65:7.5: ‘yagghe, bhante, jāneyyāsi—ahaṃ addasaṃ araññe pavane caramāno purāṇaṃ maggaṃ purāṇañjasaṃ pubbakehi manussehi anuyātaṃ tamanugacchiṃ.
sn12.65:7.6: Tamanugacchanto addasaṃ purāṇaṃ nagaraṃ purāṇaṃ rājadhāniṃ pubbakehi manussehi ajjhāvuṭṭhaṃ ārāmasampannaṃ vanasampannaṃ pokkharaṇīsampannaṃ uddhāpavantaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
sn12.65:7.8: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā taṃ nagaraṃ māpeyya.
sn12.65:7.9: Tadassa nagaraṃ aparena samayena iddhañceva phītañca bāhujaññaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ vuddhivepullappattaṃ.
sn12.65:7.10: Evameva khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, addasaṃ purāṇaṃ maggaṃ purāṇañjasaṃ pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātaṃ.
sn12.65:8.1: Katamo ca so, bhikkhave, purāṇamaggo purāṇañjaso pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyāto?
sn12.65:8.4: Ayaṃ kho so, bhikkhave, purāṇamaggo purāṇañjaso pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyāto, tamanugacchiṃ;
sn12.65:8.24: Tadabhiññāya ācikkhiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ.
sn12.65:8.25: Tayidaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitan”ti.
